title: No HexTech Chest on S rANK
body: Basicly i played ranked game with annie {{champion:1}} and got s rank for the first time ,even in champion menu i can clearly see that chest is silver colour , i get key fragments all day but no chests , what gives?

replies.body: I don't see any champion mastery history with the account you're posting from.  It's likely, though, that you've already received a chest for Annie in the past.  You can only get one chest for a champion per season.  More info is also available at our [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide.  Hope that helps!
I know about Annie, i played Mundo today and first time got S on him playng as support , i never played him before and it clearly sais that i got s on him and chest next to him is silver colour?

Unfortunately, I can't look into this for you without the correct summoner name.  The golden border around the champion profile signifies that a mastery for it was already earned.  Feel free to reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you need further context on an obtained chest, or feel that you might be missing on.  Thanks!
My real summoners name is Fre3lancer , if it possible just take a pick buddy much apreciated <3

Thanks!  Looking into this, you were out of mastery chest drops for the week you played Dr. Mundo.  You can check the chest icons on your profile tab which will indicate how many mastery chests you can receive until the next refresh.  Best of luck!
But all 4 chests are silver colour , not gold , how can i be out of them if i didnt get any in this week friend?

On the front page of your profile, gold is actually the color that indicates available chests to earn, and silver chests indicate ones you have already earned. So if all 4 chests are silver, that means you have no chest slots available.

This can be very confusing, especially since looking at the champions tab, it's the exact opposite.
so i cant earn chest because i need to wait basicly? but i didnt get any chest in 2 weeks lol cant understand how  this system works
